basics.name: Anup Narvekar
basics.title: Software engineer
basics.summary: I build performant and scalable backend architectures.

about.bio: I'm a software engineer with 4 years of experience in Backend dev. I specialize in crafting high-performance RESTful APIs using Node.js & Python. Skilled in SQL, MongoDB, AWS, Redis and Docker with a strong eagerness to learn, grow, and adapt. When I'm not coding, you can find me either gamming or sleeping :)

projects.name: Order Processing System
projects.description: A order processing system built with Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Redis, and AWS for asynchronously processing orders

projects.name: Contest Participation System (Backend)
projects.description: An application that allows users to participate in timed contests, answer questions, compete on a leaderboard and win prizes!.

projects.name: Diabetes Mellitus Prediction System (Research paper)
projects.description: A machine learning model used to classify users as diabetic or non-diabetic

experience.summary: Onboarded for a Python + MERN stack based project; project later cancelled pre-start due to client-side changes.

highlights: Gained hands-on experience building apps with React and React Native.
Fixed production bugs in the Skillbuilder.io project, ensuring stability and performance.
Built AI-driven pipelines with CrewAI to automate workflows, increasing productivity by 80%.
Developed and optimized AI agents for creating Product Requirement Documents (PRDs) from transcripts, reducing manual effort by 90%.
Utilised open-source LLMs (with Ollama, Aider, Continue.dev, etc) to accelerate development cycles.
Designed and implemented high-performance REST APIs using Node.js and Express.js, achieving a 30% improvement in system response times.
Optimized slow Legacy SQL queries, improving performance by 30%.
Utilized Redis caching, pagination and Docker to improve backend efficiency and scalability.

contact.message: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to reach out if you'd like to connect!
